subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights improved to 5-0 as the top-ranked defense held the Connecticut Huskies to 54 rushing yards in Saturday’s victory.
snippet: The Scarlet Knights improved to 5-0 as the top-ranked defense held the Connecticut Huskies to 54 rushing yards in Saturday’s victory.
